desc: An Independent lifestyle shop in the heart of Ilkley. Sustainable fashion, great quality at reasonable prices. Lovely clothing, homeware, cards, candles and gifts. Chalk, Nümph, Fransa, Brakeburn clothing. St Eval candles.

layout.text:
An independent lifestyle shop in the heart of Ilkley. Sustainable fashion, great quality at reasonable prices. Lovely homeware, cards, candles and gifts .

New items are being added daily to our website.
